name: Paper Plane (itch) (Sky Drake Studio, Hachimonji, Toro)
name_original: Paper Plane (itch) (Sky Drake Studio, Hachimonji, Toro)
description:
Relax and coast through the shape of a paper plane. Let it connect you to distant memories...

-- 

Controls:
Move Up/W
Move Down/S
